name: Baa-aaa-aaa
description:
A game created for Meditations, a project by Rami Ismail that features one short game experience every day, then it's gone until that same day the next year. I've decided that while most people will experience my game only on that day, a few might want to download it for good.

My game ran on January 12th. It will run again on January 12th 2019.

It's up to you to draw conclusions about the game's meaning, but to help you out, here's the paragraph my game runs with:

"I'm a compulsive project juggler - I constantly start new projects before finishing the old ones, so it's hard to keep it all in my head at the same time. Never is that more evident than at the start of the year when I have the energy to come up with lots of new ideas".
